name: LOCTITE 263
description:
LOCTITE 263 is a high-strength, high-temperature anaerobic threadlocker designed to provide permanent locking and sealing of threaded fasteners. This liquid product is ideal for applications where high vibration and dynamic loads are present. It can withstand temperatures up to 300°F (149°C) and has a breakaway torque of up to 35 Nm. LOCTITE 263 is suitable for a wide range of materials, including steel, stainless steel, and aluminum. It also has excellent resistance to chemicals and fuels. Use LOCTITE 263 to ensure reliable and long-lasting connections. For best results, apply a small amount to the threaded area.

Keywords: LOCTITE 263 threadlocker liquid high strength high temperature anaer
keywords: LOCTITE 263, Bangladesh, adhesive, sealant, construction, electronics, industrial, repair, bonding agent, chemical

description:
